Typedef Documentation

typedef void(* SchedulerHandler)(double time, const Message *pMessage, Boolean bAdded, void *pUserArg)

Scheduler adding/removing message handler

Parameters:
time [in] time, when a message should be issued
pMessage [in] pointer to message instance
bAdded [in] if TRUE message is being added, otherwise removed
pUserArg [in] user defined argument

EStatus SchedulerGetMessage ( Scheduler *  pThis,
Message **  ppMessage 
)

Retrieves available message and removes it from queue

Parameters:
pThis [in] pointer to instance
ppMessage [out] pointer to message will be stored at *ppMessage
Returns:
eSTATUS_SCHEDULER_NO_MESSAGES_AVAILABLE if there are no ready messages

eSTATUS_COMMON_OK if a message was retrieved
